name: Top country or economy of birth for foreign-born STEM workers, by occupation group: 2021
description: Top country or economy of birth for foreign-born STEM workers, by occupation group: 2021

creator.name: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics

specialValues.D: suppressed to avoid disclosure of confidential information

notes: Data include the employed, civilian, non-institutionalized population ages 16–75 and exclude those currently enrolled in primary or secondary school. Foreign-born individuals were born outside of the United States and were not citizens by birth.
sources: Ruggles S, Flood S, Goeken R, Schouweiler M, Sobek M, 2022, IPUMS USA: Version 12.0, 2021 American Community Survey (ACS), https://doi.org/10.18128/D010.V12.0, accessed 23 December 2022.Science and Engineering Indicators
